project_name: FilPonto: Public goods chain infrastructure & collaborations support for Filecoin
description:
FilPonto.io supports Filecoin chain infrastructure as ecosystem public goods and coordinates dev tooling and useful integrations, as well as technical integration support and grants advisory to the Filecoin ecosystem. Nucleating from PL Outercore in April 2024, FilPonto has interacted with ~50 teams exploring technical projects on Filecoin in 2024 and 2025 and helped them navigate the ecosystem: dapps, infrastructure providers, explorers, integrators, developers.

- Top-level summary of past year of work:
    - Coordinating RPC providers, Chain indexers, Chain APIs, RPC performance, Chain ETL pipeline
    - Coordinating Wallet Tooling: Filecoin Safe, iso-filecoin, FilSnap in Metamask, Filecoin Ledger App, EIP-191
    - Coordinating Dev Tooling: Gelato, Goldsky, Glif Nodes additional services
    - Coordinating Explorers
    - Defi integrations
    - Storage Market tooling (Filecoin.tools / CID Checker, DDO explorations with Lordforever)
    - RetroPGF integration technical support
    - ProPGF Selection Committee advisory
    - Exploratory projects: f05 x stablecoin Filecoin Pay with CID Gravity, a major POC, Hashstream for verifiable bytestreams, working with FilOz to improve Eth RPC performance for subgraph support
    - Grants Advisory - working closely with FF, Builder Grants, sourcing new ecosystem grants

- [Detailed description of FilPonto's activities, public goods funding and advisory activies for the previous 2024-2025 year](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1e2fi0R6NbvAoB8hkf6WtgUzqpMR4mGTvfhrQQBR5WpM/edit?usp=sharing)
end_user: dapp builders, infrastructure providers, explorers, integrators, developers, end users
top_five_dependents: - All dapps operating on Filecoin, from DEXes to Drips to Filecoin Safe have benefitted from FilPonto's integration support and coordination of essential dev tooling and chain infrastructure.
